name: Apocalypse Ravi
background: Originally born in a small village, she was chosen to become an incarnation of the god of war, before accidentally falling into another dimension while fighting an enemy general. She has no memories of her life before she was deified.

skills.soulBurnEffect: Greatly increases amount of damage dealt. Does not trigger a Dual Attack.
skills.name: Spectral Axe
skills.description: Attacks the enemy with an axe, absorbing some of the damage dealt as Health. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

skills.name: War God's Might
skills.description: Critical Hit Chance increases by 5% for every 20 Fighting Spirit. Consumes 10 Fighting Spirit to recover Health after being attacked. Amount recovered increases proportional to the caster's max Health. Begins the first battle with 50 Fighting Spirit.

skills.name: Deliverance: Soul Exchange
skills.description: Delivers divine judgment down upon the enemy. When an enemy is defeated, revives one random dead ally with 10% Health before granting Skill Nullifier once. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

specialtySkill.name: Infernal Gatekeeper
specialtySkill.description: Wherever she goes, pandemonium follows.

summonQuote: I have descended to fulfill the prophecy with my own hands.
description: A girl born amidst calamity, revered as the god of war

name: Aramintha
background: Aramintha is a gentle and cheerful woman, and leader of the Phantom CIC, a group dedicated to investigating the Unknown to whom she lost her husband. She is an incredible fighter, but often gets caught up bragging about her husband when she's not in a battle.

skills.name: Ignite
skills.description: Attacks an enemy with an explosion of flames, with a 35% chance to burn for 2 turns. Decreases cooldown of Fire Pillar by 1 turn.

skills.name: Catalyst
skills.description: Sprinkles a catalyst, increasing Attack of all allies for 2 turns. If an enemy is burned, the catalyst will explode and deal damage to all enemies, making them unhealable for 2 turns.

skills.name: Fire Pillar
skills.description: Attacks all enemies with a massive fire pillar, with a 80% chance to burn for 2 turns, and 30% chance to stun for 1 turn, before increasing the caster's Combat Readiness by 50%.

specialtySkill.name: Leader of Phantom
specialtySkill.description: She is cold-hearted and resolute in achieving her goals.

summonQuote: Pleased to meet you, let's work together.
description: Leader of the Phantom CIC, Unknown investigators

name: Arbiter Vildred
background: Once among the greatest of believers in the Goddess and her Covenant, Arbiter Vildred joined hands with the Acolyte Kayron and betrayed everyone and everything he once believed in. Within his body is contained the power of the Archdemon Anghraf.

skills.name: Sweep
skills.description: Rapidly attacks two enemies with a swordstorm, decreasing their Combat Readiness by 10%.

skills.name: Dark Contract
skills.description: After receiving lethal damage, caster regenerates to 70% Health, 100% Combat Readiness, full Focus, and resets cooldown for Dark Blade.

skills.name: Dark Blade
skills.description: Attacks all enemies, decreasing Hit Chance for 2 turns. When Focus is full, consumes it all, increasing damage dealt. When the enemy is defeated with this skill, cooldown does not occur.

specialtySkill.name: Irresistible Offer
specialtySkill.description: Neither truth nor lie matters to his offer.

summonQuote: Do you think you can handle the power I possess?
description: A knight who has embraced the boundless power of darkness

name: Baal & Sezan
background: Sezan was once a dark magician, until her body was destroyed in a forbidden summoning ceremony gone awry. Before her soul also perished, her apprentice Baal placed it inside a doll, and together they have embarked on a long journey to return her soul to a Human body.

skills.name: Ghost Haunt
skills.description: Summons an evil spirit to attack the enemy, with a 35% chance to inflict poison for 2 turns.

skills.name: Dark Cloud
skills.description: Summons the Cloud of Darkness to attack all enemies, dealing damage proportional to the number of debuffs inflicted on the enemy. When the enemy is defeated by this attack, the cooldown for Last Requiem is reset.

damageModifiers.name: target_debuff_rate
damageModifiers.description: Increased damage per debuff on target.

skills.name: Last Requiem
skills.description: Baal & Sezan attack all enemies with Strike Magic, with a 65% chance to decrease Speed and Defense and make them unhealable for 2 turns.

specialtySkill.name: Necromancer
specialtySkill.description: Baal & Sezan don't back down easily; something in their hearts just won't let them.

summonQuote: If Sezan wishes it, we will go.
description: A great magician-turned-doll, and her faithful apprentice

name: Baiken
background: She lost her family and friends in a Gear attack led by That Man. From that point on she walked the path of Asura, obsessed with exacting revenge on That Man. Tough and decisive, she boasts fighting power that can rival even that of a Gear.

skills.name: Tatami Gaeshi
skills.description: Attacks the enemy repeatedly, with a 45% chance each to inflict two bleed effects for 2 turns. A critical hit will reduce the caster's skill cooldowns by 1 turn.

skills.name: Tsurane Sanzu-watashi
skills.description: Attacks the enemy with expert swordsmanship, with a 55% chance each of inflicting three bleed effects for 2 turns. One bleed effect ignores Effect Resistance. A critical hit will grant an extra turn.

skills.name: Garyo Tensei
skills.description: Delivers a deadly blow, detonating any bleed effects inflicted on the enemy at the end of the turn. A critical hit increases the combat readiness of all allies by 15%.

specialtySkill.name: Thirst for Revenge
specialtySkill.description: One day she will get revenge on That Man for what he did to her.

summonQuote: I don't strive to achieve a greater good. It's a dog-eat-dog world, I kill anyone, no matter if they're good or evil.
description: A one-armed, one-eyed samurai dreaming of revenge

name: Basar
background: Leader of one of the six biggest merchant guilds in Savara, Basar is a seller of poisons and explosives. A genius of business, at a young age he has gained enough power to compare with the great Afih Merchant Guild.

skills.name: Sand Wind
skills.description: Attacks with wind magic, with a 50% chance to transfer one debuff from the caster to the enemy before inflicting a random debuff for 2 turns.

skills.name: Hurricane
skills.description: Attacks all enemies by releasing a hot sand hurricane, with 60% chance each to decrease Hit Chance and Attack for 2 turns.

skills.name: Sandstorm
skills.description: Attacks all enemies with sand magic, dispelling all buffs, and making them unable to be buffed for 2 turns, before decreasing Combat Readiness by 30%.

specialtySkill.name: Magnet to Gold
specialtySkill.description: You need passion to become rich.

summonQuote: I wondered when you'd call.
description: A genius holding sway over the economy of an entire continent

name: Cecilia
background: A brave woman known as the Storm Dragon Knight. Cecilia is Queen of Wintenberg and has a strong sense of responsibility. She has a righteous and sincere personality, but will stubbornly resist any attempts to change her mind.

skills.name: Deliverance
skills.description: Attacks with a spear, with a 35% chance to decrease Defense fo 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

skills.name: Command Strike
skills.description: Attacks all enemies with a magical spear, with a 35% chance to decrease Attack for 2 turns. The chance increases by 50% when the caster's Health is less than 50%. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

skills.name: Ruinous Retribution
skills.description: Attacks all enemies with a spear infused with dark energy, 85% chance to provoke for 1 turn, granting a barrier to the caster for 2 turns. Damage dealt and barrier strength increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

specialtySkill.name: Legacy of Dragon Knight
specialtySkill.description: Having long fought dragons, the Wintenberg dynasty passes down their knowledge via holy scripture.

summonQuote: I am Cecilia. Please, feel free to call me Ceci.
description: Tough and beautiful\nQueen of Wintenberg

name: Cermia
background: A fiercely competitive but also horribly unlucky knight, she is very hot-headed and often gambles and loses everything. Her impulsive nature forced her parents to give all of the inheritance to her sister Carrot, who provides her an allowance to live off of.

skills.name: Playing with Fire
skills.description: Attacks with a flaming sword, with a 55% chance to make the target unhealable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Hot Streak!
skills.description: Shoots fire, granting the caster Increase Attack (Greater), resetting the cooldown of All-in!, and granting an extra turn.

skills.name: All-In!
skills.description: Attacks with a blazing inferno, penetrating Defense by 50%.

specialtySkill.name: Fiery Resolve
specialtySkill.description: Even if there is no hope of victory, she refuses to give up and tries again.

summonQuote: Aha! I'm here to honor you with my presence.
description: A hot-headed knight who wields fire

name: Charles
background: Although he may be rigid and loyal, he cannot help but act like an overprotective servant to Aither, and will deal with all kinds of things in order to protect him.

skills.name: Slash
skills.description: Attacks with a giant sword, with a 50% chance to decrease Attack for 1 turn, and a 25% chance to activate Smash. Effect chance is doubled if the enemy is buffed.

skills.name: Smash
skills.description: Attacks the enemy repeatedly with a giant sword, with an 80% chance to dispel all buffs. Damage dealt increases proportional to number of buffs granted to the caster.

skills.name: Faithful Strike
skills.description: Attacks all enemies with a swordstorm, increases Attack of all allies for 2 turns. Additionally increases Defense of the caster for 2 turns. When there are three or fewer enemies, damage dealt increases as enemies become fewer.

specialtySkill.name: Justice of Ezera
specialtySkill.description: He is represented by a strong will and devotion to Ezera.

summonQuote: Walking the righteous path is not easy. Hence, we must strictly cultivate ourselves!
description: The highly respected Knight Commander of the Order of the Sword

name: Charlotte
background: Owner of La Mare, a castle in the Solayu Dark Swamp, Charlotte is known as the Lady of the Swamp. Fiercely competitive, she has a love-hate relationship with Cecilia. Full of pride, she despises anyone who points out her insecurities.

skills.name: Dual Swords
skills.description: Attacks with two swords. Increases Attack of the caster for 2 turns if the enemy's Health is above 50%, or has a 50% chance to decrease Defense of the enemy for 2 turns if the enemy's Health is below 50%.

skills.name: Ground Slam
skills.description: Slams the ground to inflict damage on all enemies, with a 25% chance to stun for 1 turn. The caster's Combat Readiness is increased by 30% each time an enemy is stunned.

skills.soulBurnEffect: Skill cooldown is decreased by 2 turns.
skills.name: Vortex
skills.description: Cuts all enemies while spinning. Damage dealt dramatically increases proportional to the number of stacked Focus.

specialtySkill.name: Shadow of Crown
specialtySkill.description: From the swamp to the throne.

summonQuote: Making new friends is a good thing.
description: Duchess of La Mare, an elegant and domineering Lady of the Swamp

name: Dark Corvus
background: Corvus was originally a soldier from Rose Apostles until something caused him to lose his faith and grow disillusioned with the world, and now he only wishes for its destruction. However, he still contains a gentle side within him.

skills.name: Shield Bash
skills.description: Attacks with a shield and absorbs some of the damage as Health, with a 50% chance to provoke for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

skills.name: Ruin's Advent
skills.description: When attacked, the caster has a 70% chance of their skill cooldown being decreased by 1 turn, or 2 turns in the case of a critical hit.

skills.name: Devil's Descent
skills.description: Attacks with a lethal hit, absorbing damage dealth as Health. Damage dealt is only affected by the caster's Health and does not trigger critical hit. Begins the battle with a full skill cooldown count.

specialtySkill.name: Siege Destroyer
specialtySkill.description: Enemies cower when they see him destroy fortress walls.

summonQuote: If you require my strength, I will assist you.
description: A tired destroyer who despises the world

name: Diene
background: Diene, Saint of Ezera, received the Goddess's divine revelation and fearlessly led the world to victory against the Archdemon, even without the Heir of the Covenant. Later, she became Ezera's queen.

skills.name: Light of Judgement
skills.description: Emits a ray of brilliant light, increasing the caster's Combat Readiness by 10%. Effect doubles when caster is buffed.

skills.name: Blessings of the Goddess
skills.description: With the Blessings of the Goddess, covers all allies with a barrier for 2 turns before dispelling one debuff. Barrier strength increases proportional to the target's max Health.

skills.name: Saint's Prayer
skills.description: A miracle of the Goddess manifests, increasing Attack and Critical Hit Resistance of all allies for 3 turns, before increasing the caster's Combat Readiness by 50%.

specialtySkill.name: Saint of Ezera
specialtySkill.description: She overcomes the hardship through her deeply pious faith.

summonQuote: Hello. I am a sister of the Holy Order of the Blue Cross, DieneTali.
description: A staunchly pious nun of Ezera

name: Destina
background: Nicknamed "the Beast of the Western Light," Destina is a master of light and metal who has physically manifested in the image of her deeply beloved Soul Weaver, Ruele.

skills.soulBurnEffect: Attacks the enemy and greatly heals all allies. Does not trigger a Dual Attack.
skills.name: Key to an Oath
skills.description: Attacks the enemy with a staff and heals the ally with the lowest Health. Healing increases proportional to the target's max Health.

skills.name: Regen
skills.description: Blesses an ally, recovering their Health and increasing their Combat Readiness by 30%. Healing increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

skills.name: Destina's Grace
skills.description: Grants all allies the blessing of a Spirit Lord, dispelling all debuffs and recovering Health. If ally is debuffed, their Combat Readiness will also be increased by 15% per each debuff. Effect can only be applied up to 4 times. Healing increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

specialtySkill.name: Path of Light
specialtySkill.description: Destina, the Spirit Lord of Light, keeps many memories. The warmth of light, the coldness of loss.

summonQuote: I am the Spirit Lord Destina. But now... I am the Saint of Light.
description: Beast of the Western Light, a Spirit Lord of Light and Autumn

ex_equip.name: Ruele's Sad Promise
ex_equip.description: A mysterious concotion of life created by combining the laws of light and nature and the love of a noble soul.

enhancements.description: Dispels one debuff from the ally with the lowest Health when using Key to an Oath.
Increases the target's Combat Readiness by 20% when using Regen.
Decreases skill cooldown of Destina's Grace by 1 turn.

name: Elena
background: From a young age, her parents taught her the doctrine of the stars. Despite her youth, she now leads the faithful of Constella with her unwavering devotion and strong connection to the Spirits.

skills.soulBurnEffect: Dispels all debuffs from all allies.
skills.name: Starlight's Will
skills.description: Attacks with the power of the stars, dispelling one debuff each from two allies.

skills.name: Guardian's Authority
skills.description:
Decreases the damage received from attacks that target all enemies by 10% and activates Consecrated Ground. When this effect is granted more than once, only the strongest effect is applied. Consecrated Ground can be activated once every 2 turns.
Consecrated Ground: Recovers the Health of all allies. Amount recovered increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

skills.name: Eternally Shining Comet
skills.description: Attacks all enemies with a meteor shower, granting invincibility for 1 turn and increased Effect Resistance for 2 turns to all allies.

specialtySkill.name: Image Management
specialtySkill.description: She cannot allow her faithful congregants to see any unpleasant sides of her.

summonQuote: I'm Elena, a descendant of the stars.
description: High Priestess of Constella gazing up at the shining stars

name: Iseria
background: Second-in-Command of the Order of the Sword, Iseria is an Elf unable to return to her ancestral home of Dun Blyraia due to some reason. Known as the Knight of White Flowers, she has a calm and solemn personality.

skills.soulBurnEffect: Increases effect chance by 50% and increases damage dealt. Does not trigger a Dual Attack.
skills.name: Refined Flower
skills.description: Throws swords at the enemy, with a 35% chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns.

skills.name: Oathkeeper
skills.description: Resets skill cooldown of an ally except for the caster with light energy. Grants an extra turn.

skills.name: Full Bloom
skills.description: Attacks with a giant Magic Sword, dispelling all buffs, decreasing Defense, and making them unable to be buffed for 2 turns.

specialtySkill.name: Unknown Call
specialtySkill.description: Elves are always curious about new worlds.

summonQuote: My name is Iseria, the Knight of White Flowers,and the keeper of the oath.
description: The Knight of White Flowers, protector of a solemn oath

name: Judge Kise
background: An Heir of the Sixth World, Kise is leader of the Nocturnes. She fought every battle against the Archdemon alongside the Guardian Kromcruz. Though she can be sluggish and sharp-tongued, she cares greatly for her fellow Heirs.

skills.name: Sever
skills.description: Attacks with a Scythe, with a 35% chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns.

skills.name: End of Evil
skills.description: Attacks all enemies with a scythe, with a 75% chance to dispel a buff from each enemy. Damage dealt increases with more enemies.

skills.name: Wave of Light
skills.description: Attacks all enemies by distorting space and time, with a 55% chance to increase skill cooldown three times by 1 turn.

specialtySkill.name: Fate Watcher
specialtySkill.description: Facing her fate, she carries out her duty.

summonQuote: This is my duty. I will go with you until the world ends.
description: An observer of fate, the Heir who watches over the world

name: Ken
background: Born an orphan, Ken has faced many hardships in his life, but manages to maintain a bright and optimistic personality. He believes the only way to survive is through strength, and dedicates his life to training and always admires the strong.

skills.name: Knockout
skills.description: Attacks with a flurry of strikes, with a 35% chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns. If the caster is granted Vigor, also burns target for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

skills.name: Celestial Kick
skills.description: Attacks the enemy with a kick, increasing Speed of the caster for 2 turns, with a 75% chance to decrease Defense of the target for 2 turns. Gains 40 Fighting Spirit when an enemy is defeated. If caster is granted Vigor, ignores Effect Resistance. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

skills.name: Phoenix Flurry
skills.description: Delivers a powerful blow after a flurry of strikes, stunning for 1 turn and decreasing Attack for 2 turns, before granting Vigor to the caster for 4 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health. Caster begins the first battle with 50 Fighting Spirit, and gains 5 Fighting Spirit when attacked.

specialtySkill.name: Victory Is Ours
specialtySkill.description: Exuding confidence, no one can defeat him in this battle.

summonQuote: Leave everything to me!
description: I will become stronger! A lively fist-fighter

name: Kise
background: Leader of the Nocturnes. Having been forced to part with her lover, she now has a tendency to obsess over anything she loves.

skills.name: Full Moon Scythe
skills.description: Attacks with a scythe. Damage dealt increases by 70% if target is covered by a barrier.

skills.name: Dark Scar
skills.description: Attacks all enemies with a scythe. Penetrate defense by 60% if the caster is stealthed.

skills.name: Nocturne
skills.description: Leaps towards the enemy to attack, increasing skill cooldowns by 2 turns, before granting stealth to the caster for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's current Health.

specialtySkill.name: Arbitrator's Dignity
specialtySkill.description: Even time stops in front of her will.

summonQuote: The moonlight brought you to me.
description: A mysterious woman who appears with the moonlight

name: Krau
background: One of the Knights of Taranor, Krau's outgoing and confident personality often causes people to misunderstand his intentions, but he tends to silently push ahead with what he thinks is right. He is risking everything he has to fight for the future of his homeland.

skills.name: Swordstorm
skills.description: Attack an enemy with a swordstorm with 50% chance to provoke for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

skills.name: Charge
skills.description: Shoves the enemy with a shield, decreasing Combat Readiness by 35%, before granting increased Defense to all allies for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Defense.

skills.name: Summon  Ziegfried
skills.description: Summons the guardian Ziegfried to attack, dealing damage proportional to the caster's lost Health, penetrating Defense. Also grants a barrier to the caster for 2 turns, with strength proportional to the caster's max Health. This attack cannot trigger a critical hit.

specialtySkill.name: Aggressive Protector
specialtySkill.description: A sword and a shield are all it takes.

summonQuote: Greetings, my name is Kraureit Roheil.
description: A self-confident and forward-looking knight

name: Lidica
background: Expelled from the Rose Apostles, she joined the Phantom CIC to investigate the Land of Death. She wanted to defeat the Unknown and instill faith unto others. However, her rough personality still causes problems within the Phantom CIC.

skills.name: Wild Rose
skills.description: Attacks with a sword, decreasing Combat Readiness by 10%. If the enemy is debuffed, decreases Combat Readiness by an additional 10%.

skills.name: Thornbush
skills.description: Attacks all enemies, with a 85% chance each to decrease Hit Chance for 1 turn, before dispelling one buff.

skills.name: Public Execution
skills.description: Attacks the enemy with a whip sword and decreases Combat Readiness by 100% and decreases Speed and making them unhealable for 2 turns. Grants the caster Skill Nullifier, negating damage received from the next skill attack.

specialtySkill.name: Hot-Blooded
specialtySkill.description: She was born to cause trouble all over the place.

summonQuote: Pleased to meet you. I'm Lidica.
description: A hot-tempered member of the Phantom CIC, hunting Unknown

name: Lilibet
background: Originally born into a tailor family on the planet Rekos, she was raised by mercenaries after losing her parents in a civil war, and became a wandering swordswoman. Until she met Straze, the Black Knight, and her life changed forever.

skills.name: Slice-Slice
skills.description: Strikes and slices the enemy, with a 35% chance to make them unable to be buffed for 2 turns.

skills.name: Snip-Snip
skills.description: Brutally cuts the enemy, with a 35% chance each to inflict four bleeding effects for 2 turns before increasing the caster's Combat Readiness by 50%. Deals additional damage when the target isn't buffed.

skills.name: Soul Cutter
skills.description: Slashes the enemy with Cho & Mal, inflicting extinction when the enemy is defeated. Grants the caster Skill Nullifier, negating damage received from the next attack.

specialtySkill.name: Scissors of Fury
specialtySkill.description: She cuts everything in any shape she wants.

summonQuote: You've been looking for me? Who do you want me to cut?
description: Mercenary of Rekos who wanted to be a tailor

name: Ludwig
background: Ludwig is the sole survivor of the Nocturnes, the family responsible for protecting the Lunar Cemetery. He cherishes the Guardian Kromcruz more than anyone else. Though he might look young, he is well along in years.

skills.name: Starlight
skills.description: Attacks with magic, with a 60% chance to steal one buff. Increases caster's Combat Readiness by 15% if buffed.

skills.name: Moonlight Blow
skills.description: Attacks with light, with a 35% chance to stun for 1 turn before granting the caster invincibility for 1 turn.

skills.name: Call of the Full Moon
skills.description: Attacks all enemies with Nocturne magic, penetrating Defense by 20%. Penetrates Defense by an additional 30% if the caster is invincible. A critical hit will grant the caster a barrier for 2 turns, with strength increasing proportional to the caster's Attack.

specialtySkill.name: Moonlight Knowledge
specialtySkill.description: Knowledge of the Nocturnes and immortal life has granted him mysterious and broad knowledge.

summonQuote: Fine. I am Ludwig, the final Nocturne.
description: The sole survivor of the Nocturnes

name: Luna
background: Luna is a half-Dragon, half-Human knight that has been loyal to Wintenberg since the time of Queen Francesca. Only a few know of the true feelings hidden behind her smile.

skills.name: Infinity Slash
skills.description: Stabs the target a random number of times. Skill cooldown decreases by 1-3 turns and damage dealt increases according to the number of attacks.

skills.name: Dragon Knight's Will
skills.description: Increases Attack and Critical Hit Chance by 20% if the caster's Health is more than 50%, or increases Defense and decreases chance of suffering a critical hit by 20% if the caster's Health is less than 50%.

skills.name: Ragnar Spear
skills.description: Soars into the air and hits the enemy with a spear, with a 80% chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns. Attacks with a more powerful element.

specialtySkill.name: Battle Instinct
specialtySkill.description: She watches over the endless wars looking for a chance to destroy Wintenberg.

summonQuote: My destiny, my loyalty, my horns... I offer them all to you.
description: Half-Dragon of Wintenberg seeking vengeance

name: Maid Chloe
background: "You could be the queen of our store!" -- Enticed by such a suggestion, Chloe began working in a maid caf, but with no idea what kind of work a maid is expected to do, she lacks a certain care for her customers.

skills.name: Heavy Strike
skills.description: Attacks with a hammer, with a 20% chance to stun for 1 turn.

skills.name: Maid's Cheer
skills.description: Recovers the Health of the caster and the ally with the lowest Health at the beginning of the caster's turn. Amount recovered increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

skills.name: VIP Treatment
skills.description: Entertains all allies with VIP Treatment, reviving all dead allies to 20% Health, and granting revive for 3 turns to all living allies. Increases Attack of all allies for 3 turns.

specialtySkill.name: Cafe Destroyer
specialtySkill.description: She breaks anything she touches, but she doesn't care.

summonQuote: Hi, hi! I'm this maid cafe's queen, Chloe!
description: Clueless Queen of a maid cafe

name: Ruele of Light
background: An Heir of the Sixth World, Ruele is revered for her kindness. She is a Soul Weaver who gained the favor of the Lord of Light, Destina. Her only hobby is telling fortunes with rabbit fortune cookies.

skills.soulBurnEffect: Attacks the enemy and greatly heals all allies. Does not trigger a Dual Attack.
skills.name: Key to an Oath
skills.description: Attacks the enemy with a staff and heals the ally with the lowest Health. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health, and Healing increases proportional to the ally's max Health.

skills.name: Light Pillar
skills.description: Summons a light pillar, dispelling all debuffs, recovering Health, and granting a barrier for 2 turns. Amount recovered and barrier strength increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

skills.name: Light Ascending
skills.description: Revives one dead ally with healing magic, recovering 100% of their Health and granting them invincibility for 1 turn. Living allies will receive the same effect.

specialtySkill.name: Saint of Light
specialtySkill.description: In her presence, even evil loses its darkness.

summonQuote: Well, I'll do my best. I really will!
description: A gentle saint shining with blessed light

name: Sage Baal & Sezan
background: Sage Baal fell in love with an ordinary Human named Sezan and locked her soul in a doll to preserve her for himself forever. However, as time passed her soul eroded away, and eventually, she became simply a normal doll.

skills.name: Evil Spirit's Call
skills.description: Summons an evil spirit, with a 50% chance to put an enemy to sleep for 1 turn.

skills.name: Cloud of Ruin
skills.description: Attacks all enemies by summoning storm clouds, with a 85% chance to dispel one buff and a 65% to put them to sleep. If this skill is available, increases the caster's Combat Readiness by 10% at the end of the enemy's turn.

skills.soulBurnEffect: Skill cooldown is decreased by 2 turns.
skills.name: Eye of Death
skills.description: Attacks with an evil eye, recovering the caster to max Health if the enemy is defeated. Damage dealt increases proportional to the amount of the caster's lost Health.

specialtySkill.name: Thirst for Knowledge
specialtySkill.description: He is willing to do anything and pay any price in order to obtain the knowledge he desires.

summonQuote: Great to meet you. I'm Baal Chanel, and this is my fiance, Sezan Serzan.
description: An otherworldly romantic with all kinds of knowledge

name: Seaside Bellona
background: Bellona came to provide Reingar PSC with any help they needed to assist visitors from Reingar. Although she says she's here to watch over Sez, it seems that her true goal is to relax in the resort.

skills.name: Watch Out
skills.description: Attacks the enemy with a fan, with a 60% chance to target the enemy for 2 turns.

skills.name: I'm with My Friends
skills.description:
Shares 30% of damage suffered by the caster with the foremost ally. When more than one damage sharing effect is granted, only the strongest effect is applied. The caster gains 1 Focus when an ally is attacked. When an ally is attacked and the caster's stacked Focus is 5, loses all Focus and activates You're Not Cute.
You're Not Cute: Attacks all enemies with a fan, with a 50% chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns.

skills.name: Haven't I Warned You?
skills.description: Attacks all enemies with a spray of water, with a 85% chance to make them unable to be buffed and unhealable for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases with a critical hit.

specialtySkill.name: Keep Your Distance
specialtySkill.description: She won't tolerate anyone who disturbs her relaxing vacation.

summonQuote: Sometimes it's important to get some rest. Only then can you be at the top of your game.
description: Ace of the Phantom CIC, brighter than the sun

name: Sez
background: A cynical and quiet man, Sez Gaien is a living weapon known to many as "the Berserker." After gaining power from an Acolyte to escape the Homunculus experiments, he was branded a mass murderer and has been running ever since.

skills.name: Dark Shadow
skills.description: Penetrates the enemy with dark energy, making the enemy unhealable for one turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the amount of the enemy's lost Health.

skills.name: Encroach
skills.description: If the enemy's Health is less than 50% after attacking with Dark Shadow, an extra attack is granted against all enemies with a 50% chance to make them unhealable for 1 turn. Can only activate once per turn.

skills.name: Conviction
skills.description: Inflicts lethal damage to the enemy, dealing damage proportional to the enemy's lost Health. If the enemy dies, inflicts additional damage to all enemies proportional to the caster's attack.

specialtySkill.name: Ridiculous Answer
specialtySkill.description: Makes stupid comments and is always wasting time no matter how dire the situation.

summonQuote: What do you want from me...?
description: A living weapon, the cynical Berserker

name: Silver Blade Aramintha
background: Commander of Savara's legendary Silver Blade Company. What began as a small group of people who had nowhere else to go gradually became greater in size thanks to Aramintha's charismatic leadership.

skills.soulBurnEffect: Effect Chance increases to 100%, ignores Effect Resistance.
skills.name: Flame Friction
skills.description: Attacks the enemy with an explosion of flame, with a 65% chance to burn for 1 turn.

skills.name: Flame Release
skills.description:
Activates Flame Release if the enemy is burned after using Flame Friction.
Flame Release: Attacks all enemies with mystic fire energy, increasing the caster's Combat Readiness by 20%.

skills.name: Meteor Fall
skills.description: Drops a giant meteor to stun all enemies for 1 turn, with a 40% chance each to inflict two burn effects for 2 turns.

specialtySkill.name: The Best Ruler
specialtySkill.description: Her mercenary company follows her every command.

summonQuote: I'm Aramintha, commander of the Silver Blade Company.
description: Red scorpion of Savara who cuts through the sandstorms.

name: Specimen Sez
background: Researchers who barely escaped with their lives from Sez's murderous rampage built a new living weapon modeled after him. This new weapon seeks to kill Sez to prove its superiority and worth.

skills.name: Dreamy Iron Mace
skills.description: Attacks with an iron mace, with a 50% chance to stun the enemy for 1 turn.

skills.name: Evil Claw
skills.description: Attacks all enemies with evil claws, with a 45% chance to stun for 1 turn, before increasing the caster's Combat Readiness by 50%.

skills.name: Light Storm
skills.description: Attacks the enemy with a light storm, inflicting extinction and resetting cooldown for this skill when the enemy is defeated. Penetrates Defense by 30%, or by 100% when the enemy is stunned.

specialtySkill.name: Excellent Specimen
specialtySkill.description: He's looking for Sez to prove his superiority.

summonQuote: I desire only one thing. Killing he who looks just like me.
description: A violent butcher who threatens Sez's life

name: Tamarinne
background: An idol that brings joy and cheer through her electrifying music. She has great magical talent and can harness magic with her voice. She changes her appearance on stage with the Blooming Pendant and becomes more dynamic and lively.

skills.soulBurnEffect: Greatly recovers Health of all allies after attacking.
skills.name: Serene Tune
skills.description: (Tamarinne) Attacks an enemy with serene melody and heals the ally with the lowest Health. Amount recovered increases proportional to the ally's max Health. Decreases cooldown of Shining Star by 1 turn.

skills.name: Song of the Forest
skills.description: (Tamarinne) Heals all allies with a peaceful melody. Amount recovered increases proportional to the caster's max Health. Decreases cooldown of Shining Star by 1 turn.

skills.name: Shining Star
skills.description: Before performing, dispels all debuffs inflicted on all allies and recovers the caster to max Health and grants an extra turn. The caster becomes an idol for 3 turns and performs a concert. Begins the first battle with full cooldown count.

skills.soulBurnEffect: Greatly recovers Health of all allies after attacking.
skills.name: Sing Together
skills.description: (Idol) Attacks all enemies with a beautiful voice, dispelling all buffs. Triggers a Dual Attack from the ally with the highest Attack.

skills.name: Climax
skills.description: (Idol) With a powerful performance, increases Attack of all allies for 2 turns and increases Combat Readiness by 30%, recovering Health. Amount recovered increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

specialtySkill.name: Dream Singer
specialtySkill.description: Her songs will fill you with overflowing power.

summonQuote: Twinkle twinkle~ I'll be your star in the darkness!
description: Appearing with a flash and the sound of singing!

name: Tenebria
background: An Acolyte who freely deals out all kinds of illusions, Tenebria is known as the Phantom Queen. She bewilders her targets by overwhelming them with terrifying illusions or by taking on the appearance of others. Though she may look playful, she is monstrously cruel.

skills.name: Dark Explosion
skills.description: Attacks with a explosion of dark energy, with a 40% chance to put them to sleep for 1 turn. When an enemy is put to sleep, the caster's Combat Readiness increases by 50%. This skill does not trigger a dual attack.

skills.name: Ominous Thunder
skills.description: Summons ominous thunder to attack all enemies, decreasing Combat Readiness by 20%, before decreasing Speed for 2 turns.

skills.name: Nightmare
skills.description: Drops Moon of Nightmare on all enemies, with a 70% chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns, and a 60% (Maximum 75%) chance to put them to sleep for 1 turn, before increasing Attack of the caster for 2 turns.

specialtySkill.name: Seductive Smile
specialtySkill.description: Her smiles turns dreams into nightmares.

summonQuote: What you wish to see. What you wish not to see. I will show you everything.
description: The Phantom Queen who deals in cruel illusions

name: Vildred
background: Due to his humorous style of speaking, many mistake Vildred as being light-hearted, but he has a serious side that leads him to stubbornly push ahead with what he thinks is right.

skills.name: Sweep
skills.description: Rapidly attacks two enemies with a swordstorm. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Speed.

skills.name: Dancing Blade
skills.description: Increases Attack of the caster for 2 turns and attacks all enemies one more time when an enemy is defeated by Sweep or Blade Ascent. Increases Combat Readiness of the caster by 20% when an enemy is defeated.

skills.name: Blade Ascent
skills.description: Attacks all enemies with a swordstorm, dealing damage proportional to the caster's Speed.

specialtySkill.name: Legendary Gladiator
specialtySkill.description: Under his sword, every ill will is brought to light.

summonQuote: Nice idea! I won't let you down.
description: A paragon of righteousness and principle, a reliable companion of Ras's

name: Tywin
background: Captain of the Royal Guard of Lefundos, a kingdom situated in Eureka, Tywin holds the favor of his king Schniel. A hard worker, he values rule and order over all else, and gives off the impression that he will not listen to what you have to say.

skills.name: Sword Storm
skills.description: Attacks with a swordstorm, with a 50% chance to dispel one buff. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

skills.name: Commanding Shout
skills.description: Grants increased Attack and Critical Hit Chance to the caster and an ally for 2 turns, and increases Combat Readiness by 30%.

skills.name: All-Out Attack
skills.description: Attacks all enemies again after a swordstorm, with a 75% chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns and increase Defense of the caster for 3 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

specialtySkill.name: Commander
specialtySkill.description: His incredible command ability boosts the efficiency of his troops.

summonQuote: I will follow you with all of my heart.
description: Captain of the Lefundos Royal Guard, a model of faithful diligence

name: Achates
background: Second daughter of Rosvalt, an adviser to the former king of Ezera, Achates joined the Holy Order of the Blue Cross with the wish to save the world through the Goddess's mercy. She has little to do with her older sister, heir to the family name, and seems to be holding some discontent within her heart.

skills.name: Magic Design
skills.description: Attacks with a staff, with 35% chance to decrease Attack for 2 turns.

skills.name: Rapid Cure
skills.description: Recovers ally's health and grants invincibility for 1 turn. When used on an ally except for the caster, decreases the target's skill cooldown by 1 turn. Amount recovered is proportional to the caster's max Health.

skills.name: Curing Prayer
skills.description: Dispels all debuffs from all allies before healing them. Healing increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

specialtySkill.name: Healer of Light
specialtySkill.description: Heals all wounds with the power of light.

summonQuote: I want to save the world with the mercy of healing.
description: A faithful healer following a sacred oath

name: Armin
background: A particularly ticklish feline Suin, Armin is the valiant and cheerful Commander of the Longtail Company. However, she is easily tempted, and quickly convinced to go along with the whims of her fellow mercenaries. She loves to collect earrings but since her ears are so sensitive she's unable to actually wear them.

skills.name: Takedown
skills.description: Attacks with a large shield, with a 25% chance of stunning for 1 turn. When the enemy is debuffed, the chance will increase. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Defense.

skills.name: Flash of Light
skills.description: Releases a bright light to attack all enemies, with a 85% chance each to decrease Hit Chance for 2 turns, and inflict poison for 3 turns. Increases Defense of the caster for 2 turn.

skills.soulBurnEffect: Skill cooldown is decreased by 2 turns.
skills.name: Shield Wall
skills.description: Covers all allies with the Shield of Light and grants a barrier for 3 turns, recovering Health. Barrier strength is proportional to caster's Defense, and amount recovered is proportional to the target's max health. Decreases damage suffered by all allies by 10% when this skill is under cooldown.

specialtySkill.name: Agile Mercenaries
specialtySkill.description: Handles requests with diligence and efficiency.

summonQuote: Oh, did you need something? Just let me know!
description: Unmatched in her bravery, commander of the Longtail Company

ex_equip.name: Golden Cat's Treasure
ex_equip.description: An ear-protecting ornament that was passed down in Armin's family and brings wealth and honor.

enhancements.description: Takedown's chance of stunning is increased by 25%.
Shield Wall's barrier strength is increased by 50%.
Dispels one debuff from all allies when using Shield Wall.

name: Assassin Cartuja
background: A member of the Sicar assassin organization, Cartuja is an optimistic thrill seeker who finds great joy in observing the world.

skills.name: Shred
skills.description: Attacks with sharp claws, with a 35% chance to inflict bleeding for 2 turns.

skills.name: Battle Frenzy
skills.description: Increases Evasion Chance of all allies by 15%. When the turn ends, successfully evades the next attack once. Combat Readiness increases by 10% each time evading the enemy's attack.

skills.name: Sudden Assault
skills.description: Dashes towards the enemy to attack, stunning for 1 turn. Decreases Defense for 2 turns.

specialtySkill.name: Glorious Wound
specialtySkill.description: His accomplishments as a warrior and hunter number as many as his scars.

summonQuote: Meeting new people is one way to have fun.
description: A judge presiding over a world full of thrills

name: Assassin Cidd
background: A boy who spent his days looking for a place where he belonged, until Eligos took him in.

skills.name: Slice
skills.description: Attacks with an axe, with a 40% chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Speed.

skills.name: Swift Action
skills.description: When somebody dies, caster is granted increased Attack for 1 turn and Combat Readiness increases by 15%. Cooldown 1 turn.

skills.name: Execution
skills.description:
Attacks the enemy with a powerful ground pound, silencing them for 1 turn and decreasing their Combat Readiness by 50%, before increasing Evasion Chance of the caster for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster and the enemys speed.
Removes 20 Souls from the opponent.

specialtySkill.name: Faithful Dog
specialtySkill.description: He will do whatever it takes to fulfill his given mission.

summonQuote: Are we assassinating someone today too? Who's our target?
description: Eligos's faithful dog with a sad past

name: Assassin Coli
background: A silent assassin in the shadows, it is said that anyone who sees the glint of Assassin Coli's blade in the moonlight will not live much longer.

skills.name: Ambush
skills.description: Ambushes the enemy, dealing additional damage if stealthed, and grants the caster increased Speed for 1 turn. Damage dealt also increases proportional to the caster's Speed.

skills.name: Ambush
skills.description: If free of debuffs, has a 80% chance each to increase Attack for 1 turn at the beginning of turn, and grant stealth for 1 turn when the turn ends.

skills.name: Murder
skills.description: Moves silently to attack the enemy, stunning for 1 turn. Silences all enemies when the target is defeated. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Speed.

specialtySkill.name: Split Second
specialtySkill.description: Victory becomes hers in the blink of an eye.

summonQuote: I am the assassin Nicolette Fleure.
description: An agile assassin hiding in the silence

name: Auxiliary Lots
background: A magical doll modeled on Lots. Compared to the original Lots, this doll is extremely competitive and desperate for recognition, and so participates in as many activities around Reingar as possible.

skills.name: Black Magic
skills.description: Attacks with a magic sphere, increasing caster's Combat Readiness by 15%.

skills.name: Mana Injection
skills.description: Injects an ally with mana, increasing Attack for 2 turns and increasing Combat Readiness by 80%, before granting the caster increased Attack for 2 turns and a 30% increase in Combat Readiness.

skills.name: Desolation
skills.description: Attacks all enemies by releasing strong Mana, with a 50% chance to silence for 2 turn.

specialtySkill.name: No Tolerance
specialtySkill.description: Expressionless, with little patience. Disobeying his orders will bring swift punishment.

summonQuote: I'm a different Lots altogether, shall we see who deserves to be called the true Lots?
description: The first magical doll to be created in Reingar

name: Blood Blade Karin
background: Karin is embroiled in an endless battle against the will of a cursed magical sword, compelled by its power to cause trouble. Though aggressive and cold-hearted while possessed by the sword, she sometimes escapes from the control of it and shows an unexpected side.

skills.name: Sequential Cutter
skills.description: Quickly strikes the enemy with a sword, absorbing Health proportional to damage dealt. Caster's Combat Readiness increases by 50% if the enemy is defeated.

skills.name: Cursed Sword
skills.description: As Health decreases, Attack, Defense, and Speed increase.

skills.name: Blade Art: Dragon
skills.description: Attacks all enemies, sacrificing 20% of the caster's Health. Grants the caster an extra turn when an enemy is defeated.

specialtySkill.name: Blood Chaser
specialtySkill.description: The smell of blood travels far. She'll track the victim in no time.

summonQuote: I will show you the power of the enchanted blade.
description: The wielder of a magical blade thirsty for blood

name: Cartuja
background: In Farche, the nomadic Tuharta Clan is wiped out by a great sandstorm. Cartuja leads the few survivors as they wander in search of a new home, working day and night as a mercenary to raise enough money to save his clan.

skills.name: Shred
skills.description: Attacks with sharp claws, with a 35% chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

skills.name: Danger Zone
skills.description: When attacked, increases Combat Readiness by 10%. Increases Combat Readiness by an additional 10% if the caster's Health is less than 50%.

skills.name: Predatory Roar
skills.description: Attacks all enemies with wild energy, healing the caster by 50% of max Health before granting increased Defense for 2 turns, with a 50% chance to decrease Attack of the enemy for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health, with additional damage increase when the caster has less than 50% Health.

specialtySkill.name: Explorer
specialtySkill.description: Their curiosity for the new world is second to none.

summonQuote: I feel like we'll be good friends.
description: Courageous and valiant, the greatest warrior in Farche

name: Celestial Mercedes
background: A mysterious being from the stars, nobody knows where Celestial Mercedes came from, or what she has gone through. She freely duplicates any Human or thing she pleases, and currently resides in the Farche Frontier in a cloned body of Mercedes.

skills.name: Divine Bolt
skills.description: Attacks with shock magic, with a 30% chance to make the enemy unhealable for 2 turns.

skills.name: Dimensional Rupture
skills.description: Attacks all enemies with a massive light sphere, dealing damage proportional to the enemy's max Health.

skills.soulBurnEffect: Skill cooldown is decreased by 2 turns.
skills.name: Finale
skills.description: Attacks all enemies by releasing spells of The Last Spellbook. Increases Attack of the caster for 2 turns and increases Combat Readiness by 20% according to the number of critical hits made.

specialtySkill.name: Good and Evil
specialtySkill.description: There's a fine line between good and evil.

summonQuote: Were you looking for me? Tell me what you want me to do.
description: Otherworldly creature, hiding her truth

name: Champion Zerato
background: Incredibly skilled in fighting, Champion Zerato boasts a flawless win streak, largely thanks to his refusal to fight anyone he may be at risk of losing to. Frost Mage Zerato has been trying to pick a fight with him for a long time, but Champion Zerato keeps making excuses to avoid it.

skills.name: Earthen Rage
skills.description: Attacks two enemies including the target with an earthen blast, transferring two debuffs from the caster to the enemy and recovering the caster's Health. Amount recovered increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

skills.name: Iron Will
skills.description: Immune to stun, sleep, and Decrease Hit Chance. Has a 80% chance to counterattack when attacked while debuffed.

skills.name: Cataclysm
skills.description: Attacks all enemies by slamming rocks, with a 60% chance each to decrease Defense and Attack for 2 turns. Increases Defense of the caster for 2 turns.

specialtySkill.name: Victory Streak
specialtySkill.description: He does not want to break his winning streak.

summonQuote: If you want to know what a genius looks like, eat your heart out.
description: An arrogant and impudent supremacist who only cares about strength

name: Challenger Dominiel
background: Fiercely proud and unreserved, Challenger Dominiel has little morality or sense of empathy. While constantly causing trouble, she refuses to admit her faults.

skills.name: Electrocute
skills.description: Attacks with electricity. A critical hit will increase damage dealt.

skills.name: Electric Charge
skills.description: When an ally makes a critical hit, the caster's next attack deals stacked additional damage proportional to the number of critical hits and their Combat Readiness increases by 10% per critical hit.

skills.name: Supercharge
skills.description: Releases powerful electricity, increasing Critical Hit Rate of all allies for 3 turns, and Combat Readiness by 10%. The caster is also granted an extra turn.

specialtySkill.name: Echo
specialtySkill.description: Dreams about her voice ringing out across continents.

summonQuote: Look at me! The successor of the Nixied Clan!
description: The confident successor of Nixied

name: Cidd
background: Cidd is the youngest member and mascot of the Wild Dog Company, a group of mercenaries headquartered in an old ruined fortress in Wetheric Moor. Contrary to his cheerful and carefree appearance, he will competently complete any task assigned to him. He cares for the Wild Dog Company as if they were family.

skills.name: Relentless Strike
skills.description: Attacks with a dagger. A critical hit will increase speed of the caster for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's speed

skills.name: Wind's Resolve
skills.description: Enhances Relentless Strike, increasing Damage dealt, when the caster is granted increased speed, and decreases defense of the enemy for 1 turn.

skills.name: Hack
skills.description: Cuts with a dagger, granting an extra turn if they enemy is defeated. Attacks using an adventageous element when the caster is granted increased Speed. Damage dealt increases proportional to caster's speed.

specialtySkill.name: Animal Instinct
specialtySkill.description: Oustanding senses of smell and hearing are very helpful when hunting.

summonQuote: Badabum! I have arrived! Cidd is here! What do you want me to do?
description: The Wild Dog Company mascot, a wild hound as fast as the wind

name: Clarissa
background: A young nun of the Holy Order of the Blue Cross, Clarissa's purity made her a mascot of the church. However, as soon as she set out on her pilgrimage, her true fighting nature began to reveal itself.

skills.name: Harsh Lesson
skills.description: Attacks with a morning star, with a 35% chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns.

skills.name: Rage
skills.description: Becomes enraged for 3 turns when an enemy is killed by Harsh Lesson or Hysteric, and grants an extra AoE attack on all enemies.

skills.name: Hysteric
skills.description: Attacks all enemies by spinning, inflicting bleeding for 2 turns. When the caster is enraged, damage dealt is increased and an additional bleeding effect can be stacked.

specialtySkill.name: Enforcer
specialtySkill.description: When she's pursuing criminals, she doesn't even sleep.

summonQuote: To follow the path once tread by the Goddess is my calling.
description: A nun with a violent split personality

name: Coli
background: Born in a village, Coli was made a refugee by the Archdemon War. She joined a band of vigilantes in order to help protect her family and has a talent for stealing items from thieves when she attacks them.

skills.name: Ambush
skills.description: Ambushes the enemy, activating Ambush again if stealthed. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Speed.

skills.name: Accurate Strike
skills.description: Attacks with an unseen blade, decreasing Combat Readiness by 30%, before granting a barrier and stealth for 1 turn. Barrier strength increases proportional to caster's Attack, and damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Speed.

skills.name: Baptism of Fire
skills.description: Attacks with a dagger and bomb, decreasing Combat Readiness by 25% three times, stunning the target for 1 turn and granting the caster stealth for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Speed.

specialtySkill.name: Life of Frugality
specialtySkill.description: Has always dreamed of using her savings to build a new village for everyone.

summonQuote: Will you call me Coli? Run with me, to the edge of the world!
description: A cheerful vigilante burdened with the horrors of war

name: Crozet
background: Knight Commander of the Order of the Shield, Crozet places a strict emphasis on following the rules, and is notoriously inflexible on them. His excessive uprightness means he often does not realize when others are playing tricks on him.

skills.name: Rush
skills.description: Attacks with a sword, with a 50% chance to decrease Attack for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Defense.

skills.name: Mark of Protection
skills.description: Grants increased Defense and a barrier to an ally for 2 turns when an attack causes their Health to fall below 50%. Barrier strength increases proportional to the target's max Health. Can be activated once every turn.

skills.name: Breakthrough
skills.description: Attacks all enemies with a swordstorm, with a 75% chance to provoke for 1 turn after decreasing their Combat Readiness by 35%. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Defense.

specialtySkill.name: Fine Dining
specialtySkill.description: You might need a specialty or two to lead the Order of the Shield.

summonQuote: I will do my best.
description: Honest and incorruptible, the Knight Commander of the Order of the Shield

name: General Purrgis
background: Daring and responsible, General Purrgis will never abandon his subordinates in a dangerous situation, and commands all of their respect.

skills.name: Heroic Strike
skills.description: Mows down enemies with a great sword, with a 50% chance to provoke for 1 turn.

skills.name: Spearhead
skills.description: Increases all allies' Combat Readiness by 10% when the caster is attacked.

skills.soulBurnEffect: Skill cooldown is decreased by 2 turns.
skills.name: Command to Charge
skills.description: Gives the command to charge, dealing damage to all enemies, with a 75% chance of stunning two random enemies for 1 turn. Increases Attack of all allies for 2 turns.

specialtySkill.name: Regular Customer
specialtySkill.description: Spend a lot of time hanging around the lobby thinking about his next task.

summonQuote: It is a general's duty to lead his people along the right path.
description: A cool-headed general commanding the respect of all

name: Guider Aither
background: An ever-cheerful traveler, Aither loves life on the road. As he embarks on a journey to find his lost memories, he is often followed by small animals.

skills.name: Whispering Spirit
skills.description: Attacks with spirit power, with a 25% chance to decrease Speed for 2 turns.

skills.name: Spirit's Protection
skills.description: Attacks with spirit power, and grants caster a barrier for 2 turns. Barrier strength is proportional to the caster's Attack.

skills.name: Wave of Force
skills.description: Delivers a blow to the enemy with the Energy of Souls, recovering Health of all allies. All allies are granted continuous healing for 2 turns. Amount healed increased proportional to damage dealt.

specialtySkill.name: Innocent Wanderer
specialtySkill.description: Neither wind nor rain can stop him.

summonQuote: Hi! Will you introduce yourself? Will you play with me?
description: A free and nimble little bird that has lost its memories

ex_equip.name: Whispered Faith
ex_equip.description: A mystical whistle that enables the user to freely exchange feelings with small creatures.

enhancements.description: Spirit Protection's barrier cover all allies.
Stuns the enemy for 1 turn when using Wave of Force.
Increases Attack of all allies for 2 turns when using Wave of Force.

name: Karin
background: Second Lieutenant in the Public Security Club of Reingar, Karin struggles to maintain order in the Magical Academy, a place brimming with dangerous creativity. Many call her the conscience and the real big boss of the Public Security Club.

skills.name: Sequential Cutter
skills.description: Strikes the enemy with a sword. A critical hit will decrease cooldown for 1 turn.

skills.name: Blade Art: Flash
skills.description: Slashes the enemy. A critical hit will decrease Defense for 1 turn and grant an extra turn.

skills.name: Blade Art: Thunder
skills.description: Cuts the enemy with lightning speed. A critical hit will increase Damage.

specialtySkill.name: Protector of Order
specialtySkill.description: As justice is the root of all order, she performs one heroic exploit after another.

summonQuote: Protector of justice, truth, magic and! Uh, what comes after that? In any case, Lieutenant Karin has arrived!
description: The righteous prosecutor of the Public Security Club

name: Khawana
background: Despite being the clever younger sister of the Great Chief, Khawana holds no political ambitions and is instead far more interested in spending quality time with friends and family, collecting interesting things, and experiencing new cultures.

skills.name: Hey There!
skills.description: Attacks the enemy with sharp sickles, with a 35% chance each to inflict two bleeding effects for 2 turns. If the enemy is debuffed after the attack, additional damage is inflicted.

skills.name: Casual Introduction
skills.description: Attacks all enemies with a flame guardian, increasing Attack of all allies for 2 turns. When all allies are Fire elemental Heroes, grants all allies skill nullifier once.

skills.name: Rough Welcome
skills.description: Attacks the enemy with a flame guardian, stunning for 1 turn before dispelling two buffs. Increases damage dealt when all allies are Fire elemental Heroes.

damageModifiers.name: skill_dmg_rate
damageModifiers.description: Increases damage dealt when all allies are Fire elemental Heroes.

specialtySkill.name: Stay Positive!
specialtySkill.description: She solves many problems with her positive attitude and constant hard work.

description: A curious and cheerful adventurer from Meldrec

name: Khawazu
background: A warrior of the Emberstorm tribe who ascended to Great Chief at a young age. He leads Meldrec with a stubborn insistence not to rely on outside assistance, but due to conflict between tribes, invading Unknowns, and the disappearance of Malicus, his troubles are starting to pile up.

skills.name: Flame Strike
skills.description: Attacks the enemy with a ball of flame, with a 25% chance to burn for 2 turns.

skills.name: Composure
skills.description:
All debuffs are dispelled and Burning Vitality is activated if attacked while debuffed. Can only be activated once every 3 turn(s).
Burning Vitality: Increases Attack of the caster for 2 turns.

skills.name: Emberstorm
skills.description: Attacks with a fiery explosion, making the target unhealable for 2 turns.

specialtySkill.name: Unshakeable Will
specialtySkill.description: Right or wrong, he has the will to see his decisions through to the end.

summonQuote: I am the leader of Meldrec.
description: The Great Chief of Meldrec who is undergoing a difficult trial

name: Kitty Clarissa
background: The Holy Order of the Blue Cross requested that Reingar find a way to calm Clarissa down. Instead, the researchers focused on how cats can still be loved after wreaking havoc. Then they turned her into a cat to eliminate everyone's complaints about her violence.

skills.name: Get Away, Meow!
skills.description: Attacks with a morning star. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health. If the caster is granted loveliness, triggers Dual Attack from the ally with the highest Attack.

skills.name: Meow I'm Angry!
skills.description: Attacks all enemies with a morning star while raging, with a 60% chance to decrease buff duration by 2 turn and make them unhealable for 2 turns. If the caster is granted loveliness, effect chance increases by 20%.

skills.name: I'm So Cute, Meow
skills.description: Wiggles tail cutely, decreasing debuff duration on all allies by 2 turns, and granting the caster immunity and loveliness for 3 turns before granting an extra turn.

specialtySkill.name: Cat's Nature
specialtySkill.description: She's very violent, but she's too adorable to be hated.

summonQuote: Are you my new servant, meow?
description: Battle-driven sister of the Holy Order of the Blue Cross who turned into a cat

name: Leo
background: Born to a family of scholars, Leo grew up learning much of warriors and myth. He is bravely traveling with his pet and good friend Racoo, in hope of realizing his dream of becoming a warrior himself.

skills.name: Sparrow Dive
skills.description: Attacks with a slingshot, with a 25% chance to stun for 1 turn.

skills.soulBurnEffect: Skill cooldown is decreased by 2 turns.
skills.name: Fox Hunt
skills.description: Attacks with a slingshot, with a 75% chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns, and a 50% chance to use Sparrow Dive.

skills.name: Flying Racoo
skills.description: Racoo flies into the enemies like a bullet and attacks all of them, decreasing Speed for 2 turns, with a 75% chance to stun.

specialtySkill.name: Kid Detective
specialtySkill.description: Sometimes an unbiased look can discover the truth.

summonQuote: I am the aspiring warrior, Leontius Leo! And this is my friend, Racoo! Nice to meet you.
description: A trouble making joker who dreams of becoming the ultimate warrior

name: Maya
background: An apprentice knight of the Order of the Shield, Maya boasts incredible arm strength. Finding great value in her work protecting people, she devoted herself to the Order of the Shield. She cares greatly for her family back home.

skills.name: Weak Blow
skills.description: Attack with a blunt weapon, with a 25% chance to stun for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Defense.

skills.soulBurnEffect: Skill cooldown is decreased by 2 turns.
skills.name: Concuss
skills.description: Attacks with a shield, with a 80% chance to stun for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Defense.

skills.name: Fraudulent Cry
skills.description: Has a 35% chance to decrease Attack and provoke all enemies for 1 turn. Increases Defense of all allies for 2 turns.

specialtySkill.name: Strong Arms
specialtySkill.description: Uses their buff arms to fight against injustice.

summonQuote: Oh, you were looking for me? Thank you!
description: A young knight with a strong arm and shield

name: Mercedes
background: A Homunculus placed in the care of Queen Diene some years previously, Mercedes has a poker face that gives away little emotion, but she grows quickly attached to those who show her kindness. Sometimes, she may awkwardly mimic others or repeat what they say.

skills.name: Divine Bolt
skills.description: Attacks two enemies with shock magic.

skills.name: Dimensional Rupture
skills.description: Attacks all enemies with a massive light sphere. When there are three or fewer enemies, damage dealt increases as enemies become fewer.

skills.name: Blazing Eye of Kal
skills.description: Releases the power of the Ancient Book to attack all enemies strongly. The lower the enemy's health, the greater the damage dealt.

specialtySkill.name: Eye of Kal's Bookmark
specialtySkill.description: The Eye of Kal's knowledge came from the Goddess Diche.

summonQuote: If that is your will, I will obey.
description: A blank-faced Homunculus chosen by The Last Spellbook

name: Purrgis
background: Believing life is all about hitting a jackpot, Purrgis loves to snoop around. Born in Farche, a poor region, he has suffered discrimination for many years, turning him into an opportunist obsessed with money.

skills.name: Falling Strike
skills.description: Mows down enemies with a great sword, with a 35% chance to decrease Speed for 2 turns, and decrease Combat Readiness by 20%. Damage dealt is proportional to the caster's max Health.

skills.name: Get Lost!
skills.description: Hits all enemies when counterattacking, with a 15% chance to stun for 1 turn. Has a 20% chance to counterattack when attacked.

skills.name: Final Blow
skills.description: Attacks all enemies with a powerful ground pound, with a 50% chance to stun for 1 turn. Increases effect chance by 100% when they have less than 30% Health. Damage dealt is proportional to the caster's max Health.

specialtySkill.name: Muscle Flexing
specialtySkill.description: Exaggerates frequently when bragging about his power.

summonQuote: Hmph, I only trust what I can see. What kind of fool believes in justice?
description: A sly mercenary dreaming of a jackpot

name: Rin
background: A brave and sturdy young girl, Rin was adopted by the great merchant Basar following the loss of her father, though she refuses to believe he is truly dead. She is full of ambition, but also good-natured with a strong sense of justice.

skills.name: Ring Throw
skills.description: Throws rings at the enemy, with a 75% chance to dispel one buff, before increasing the caster's Combat Readiness by 15%. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

skills.name: Dazzling Dance
skills.description: Dazzles the enemy with a dance, with a 50% chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns, and a 50% chance to use Ring Throw. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

skills.name: Showtime
skills.description: Heals all allies with an elegant dance, granting two random buff for 3 turns. Amount recovered increases proportional to the target's max Health.

specialtySkill.name: Cat's Eyes
specialtySkill.description: Her cat eyes glow in the darkness.

summonQuote: Hey! Call me Rin.
description: A brave and stubborn young merchant girl

name: Schuri
background: A master of gunpowder weaponry, Schuri has a strong sense of pride and arrogance, though suffers a complex about his weak physical strength.

skills.name: Rapid Fire
skills.description: Attack the enemy with a pistol, with a 25% chance to inflict poison for 2 turns.

skills.name: Explosive Gentleman
skills.description: After delivering a critical hit, the caster gains 1 Focus, and the Combat Readiness of all allies except the caster is increased by 15%.

skills.name: Rifle Shot
skills.description: Shoots all enemies with a rifle. Enhanced into Full Burst when the number of stacked Focus is more than 3. Full Burst always results in a Critical Hit, decreasing Combat Readiness of all enemies by 30%.

specialtySkill.name: Deadly Blow
specialtySkill.description: Sharp instincts separate truth from falsehood.

summonQuote: Shall I play with you since you summoned me?
description: Brimming with confidence, it's the Explosive Gentleman

name: Serila
background: With her glamorous beauty and enchanting smile, she's the quintessential witch. She loves money, especially when using it to decorate herself with beautiful things. She doesn't go anywhere without her magical weapon, Chatty.

skills.name: Seduction
skills.description: Attacks with a flame of seduction, with a 35% chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns.

skills.name: Spirit Absorb
skills.description: Absorbs the enemy's Attack, increasing Attack of the caster for 2 turns before recovering Health proportional to the damage dealt, with a 60% chance to decrease Attack of the enemy for 2 turns. When the enemy is defeated, cooldown does not increase.

skills.name: Flame Kiss
skills.description: Swallows the enemy in the flame of Chatty, the magic lantern, with a 85% chance each to inflict two burn effects for 2 turns.

specialtySkill.name: Genius
specialtySkill.description: Makes the impossible possible with their brilliance and genius.

summonQuote: Oh my, you were looking for me?
description: A glamorous witch who loves beautiful things

name: Shooting Star Achates
background: At best, a free spirit, at worst, an irresponsible hedonist. Shooting Star Achates finds a life without stimulus meaningless, and is always on the lookout for trouble.

skills.name: Magic Design
skills.description: Attacks with staff, with a 50% chance to decrease Hit Chance for 1 turn.

skills.name: Resurrection Magic
skills.description: Revives a dead ally with recovery magic and grants immortality for 1 turn. If the target is not dead, grants immortality and two random buffs for 3 turns.

skills.name: Sparkling Star
skills.description: Between the caster and the target, heals the ally with the lowest Health to the point their Health matches the other, before healing further on top. Effect is unaffected by Health buffs or debuffs. Health recovered is proportional to the max Health of each ally.

specialtySkill.name: Achates's Cheer
specialtySkill.description: No matter how desperate the situation may be, she will always root for you.

summonQuote: A new friendship begins with a One! Two! Three! Ta-da!
description: A whimsical and lovable wandering healer

name: Tera-Phantasma
background: A magical creature that has lived since before time began, seen by some as a spiritual guardian and others as an omen of catastrophe. They are rumored to share their power with those heroes they judge worthy.

skills.name: Gnaw
skills.description: Attacks with sharp teeth.

skills.name: Phantasma Seeds
skills.description: The item will be at max level when you receive it, and earn a bonus 10% EXP in battle.

description: A shadow of glory overflowing with power and wisdom

name: Troublemaker Crozet
background: Crozet's Moonlight Shade who does as he pleases with no consideration for anyone around him. Because he does whatever he wants, he's caused a lot of trouble, which has led Crozet himself to come looking for Troublemaker Crozet.

skills.name: Pledgeguard
skills.description: Attacks the enemy in an act of faith, with a 20% chance to stun for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

skills.name: Chivalry
skills.description: Receives 20% of damage suffered by the ally in the back row in their place. Only the highest damage distribution effect will be applied. Has a 35% chance to counterattack when the ally in the back row is attacked.

skills.name: Oath of Protection
skills.description: Swears an oath of protection, dispelling all debuffs from the caster and one ally, before increasing Defense for 3 turns. Grants class enhancement to the ally for 3 turns.

specialtySkill.name: Flame of Passion
specialtySkill.description: Today marks the day he told the 486th girl that he loves her.

description: A reckless knight surrounded by rumors and scandals

name: Wanderer Silk
background: An Elf born on the outskirts of Dun Blyraia, the Eternal Forest. Raised by the World Tree that pitied her, Silk is fiercely proud, but forever yearning for her people.

skills.name: Basic Shoot
skills.description: Shoots arrows at the enemy, with a 40% chance to cause bleeding for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's speed.

skills.name: Automatic Fire
skills.description: Fires a volley of arrows at the enemy, decreasing Combat Readiness by 10%. Has a 50% chance of granting an extra attack of the same kind, increasing by an additional 50% when the target is debuffed. Damage is proportional to the caster's Speed.

skills.name: Shock Arrow
skills.description: Shoots an arrow infused with the power of lightning, inflicting silence and making them unhealable for 2 turns, and decreasing Combat Readiness to 0%. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Speed.

specialtySkill.name: Calm Before the Storm
specialtySkill.description: She keeps on her toes, knowing danger lurks around every corner.

summonQuote: Did you miss me? Tell me the truth!
description: A fiercely proud Elf left alone in the Eternal Forest

ex_equip.name: Dun Blyraia's Dark Blessing
ex_equip.description: A quiver made with Mana from the dimension that Wanderer Silk came from, known to maximize her concentration.

enhancements.description: Grats the caster an extra attack regardless of whether the enemy is debuffed when using Automatic Fire.
Dispels one buff from the enemy when using Shock Arrow. (This effect is applied before inflicting silence.)
Increases Speed of all allies for 2 turns when using Shock Arrow.

name: Watcher Schuri
background: A member of the Sicar assassin organization, Watcher Schuri is an outstanding fighter, but ignorant of the ways of the world. Though his rigid way of speaking gives off an air of unapproachability, he is surprisingly straightforward and open to granting people's requests. However, he hides a secret he cannot share with others.

skills.name: Sniper
skills.description: Shoots the enemy with a rifle, with a 35% chance to target them for 2 turns.

skills.name: Quickfire
skills.description: Shoots all enemies with a rifle, with a 75% chance to dispel one buff. The caster is granted increased speed for 2 turns.

skills.name: Mana Release
skills.description: Shoots a magic bullet at the enemy, penetrating their Defense.

specialtySkill.name: Hypervision
specialtySkill.description: He can see through everything.

summonQuote: Let's do our best together.
description: A secretive Sicar assassin

name: Zerato
background: The frost mage of Reingar, Zerato is the second son of a Spirit Weaver clan, blessed by Nixied, the Lord of Winter. He's a genius who hates to feel hot, and loves showing off. Like most Reingar students he pays no attention to those things he deems unimportant, and often crosses the line in his study of magic.

skills.name: Ice Thorn
skills.description: Attacks an enemy with an ice pick, with a 40% chance to decrease Speed for 2 turns.

skills.name: Ice Pick
skills.description: Attacks the enemy repeatedly and increases the casters Combat Readiness by 50%. Damage dealt is increased when the enemy is debuffed.

damageModifiers.name: target_debuff_rate
damageModifiers.description: Increased damage if target is debuffed. Max once.

skills.name: Iceberg
skills.description: Attacks all enemies with a giant iceberg, with a 50% chance to stun for 1 turn.

specialtySkill.name: Genius of Geniuses
specialtySkill.description: Gifted with natural talent and the blessing of Nixied, nobody can best him.

summonQuote: Will I finally meet someone who can take me on?
description: A genius frost mage who will freeze everything

name: Alexa
background: Despite her young age, Alexa has managed to become a formally appointed knight of the Order of the Sword trusted with all kinds of duties. She greatly admires Iseria, who taught her how to use a sword.

skills.name: Fell
skills.description: Cuts the enemy with dual-wielded swords. A critical hit will grant an extra attack. Can only be activated once per turn

skills.name: Cold Edge
skills.description: Attacks with a cold blade with a 80% chance to inflict two poison effects for 2 turns, and increases the caster's Combat Readiness by 30%.

skills.name: Crushing Blow
skills.description: Attacks the enemy continuously, dealing damage proportional to the number of debuffs inflicted on the enemy.

specialtySkill.name: Excellent Instructor
specialtySkill.description: She's contributed greatly to helping knights in their development.

summonQuote: Before the Goddess, I vow to do my best.
description: A faithful and honest member of the Order of the Sword

name: Angelic Montmorancy
background: Even after being formally appointed a nun, Montmorancy keeps making mistakes. However, instead of blaming herself and asking others for help, she perseveres in her efforts to help others.

skills.name: Sleep Sorcery
skills.description: Attack the enemy with water energy, with a 25% chance to put them to sleep for 1 turn.

skills.name: Purification
skills.description: Dispels one debuff from all allies, and heals debuffed allies. Amount recovered is proportional to the ally's max Health.

skills.soulBurnEffect: Effect is granted to all allies.
skills.name: Watery Curtain
